segments.text: It's nice of you to see my off at the airport . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll miss you . I hope we'll keep in touch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . You've given a great help to me in the past days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . We hope you'll visit Beijing again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's almost time to get aboard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we should go . Thank you very much . Goodbye !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bye bye ! Have a pleasant journey !
segments.speaker: S1
